Company Dashboard Settings
--------------------------


This option only displays in the Admin Settings if you have an Admin default security role or a custom role with the Manage All Company Settings grant enabled.

Achievements
------------


The **Achievements** page allows you to create a badge and designate users who can award the badge to others in their Profile pages. You can only create badges and designate users to award them if you have an Admin default security role or a custom role with the Assign Achievements grants enabled.


For more information about default security roles, see [Managing Custom Roles](..\managing_custom_roles\index.md).


Worklog
-------


The **Worklog** page allows you to send reminders to users to enter worklogs. For more information, see [Specifying Worklog Settings](..\specifying_worklog_settings\index.md).


Custom Charts
-------------


The **Custom Charts** section allows you to upload custom SVG, GeoJSON, TopoJSON, or KML files to create your own charts. For more information, see [Custom Charts](..\custom_charts\index.md).


Notifications
-------------


The **Notifications** section lets you configure if you want invite emails sent to users with the option of adding a custom message.
